overview: Husband is getting ready to go to the office, Wife says she feels bored to be alone at home. Husband says he will let his office colleague and his future wife stay at home. Then the wife will not be alone at home. In the evening husbands office colleague and his future wife came and they all talked together. Then the office colleague and his future wife entered their bedroom and started doing romance. Wife stands outside their door and hears that they are romancing.
title: Kalank Gupchup
